alert.note: Alert for Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 23 at 8:15PM CDT until May 26 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River near Florence affecting Marion County. Cottonwood River at Cottonwood Falls affecting Chase County. Cottonwood River near Plymouth affecting Lyon and Chase Counties. For the Cottonwood River...including Florence, Cottonwood Falls, Plymouth...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River near Florence. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Outside the levee system in southeast Florence, flood waters flow across Park Ave Road and reach the foundation of a residential home. Northwest of Florence, the bridge on 140th Road and 1/2 mile west of Highway 77 floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Monday the stage was 3.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 24.1 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Cottonwood River Florence 22.0 3.4 Mon 7 pm CDT 21.8 20.5 5.6 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
